title: Cisco Delivers Upbeat Revenue Forecast in Sign of AI Payoff
description: Cisco Systems Inc., the largest maker of machines that run computer networks and the internet, gave an upbeat sales forecast, showing progress in its effort to capture more artificial intelligence spending.

title: AMD Rallies After Predicting Accelerating AI Sales Growth
description: Advanced Micro Devices Inc. shares rallied 9% after the chipmaker predicted accelerating sales growth over the next five years, driven by strong demand for its data center products.

title: FanDuel to Debut Prediction Market App to Fend Off Competitors
description: FanDuel, the US online gambling division of Flutter Entertainment Plc, is launching its own prediction market product, which will allow it to open up in states where traditional sports betting is illegal and deal with competitive pressure from new startup exchanges in the space.
